name: First Frog in Space
description:
In a freak space ship accident a lonely frog crashlands on a mysterious planet. Can you help him back into space?

This is a lunar-landing type of game mixed with some mining. You need to control your ship while gathering ores to maintain fuel, protecting yourself with shields and upgrading your ship to go to the next level!

-Controls-

  • Control the ship with the arrow keys
  • Gather ores with Z
  • Smash rocks with X

I had some help from my friend Karl Nilhén(@K_Sne_), he created the music and the sounds!

Stay Awesome!

/Elastiskalinjen
